Name: Apollon 88
About the game: Apollon 88 is a game where you are dropped into deep space and forced to fight for survival from ravenous hunters whose mission is to kill you for good. Navigate your way towards victory with loads of weapons and chain combos together by killing enemies quickly. Outlast hordes of enemies that will not stop at nothing to hunt you down.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Apollon 88? Check out the release date (Jun 5, 2020), developer insights from Kaitec Games, and a complete game summary.
